mcq.statement: What was one of the primary aims of Anjuman-e-Himayat-e-Islam?

options.a: To arrange for the religious and general education of Muslim boys and girls

mcq.one_liner: One of the primary aims of Anjuman-e-Himayat-e-Islam was to arrange for the religious and general education of **Muslim boys and girls**.

suggestions.topic: Services of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan (1817-1898)
